job_tasks.phrase: form successful relationships with clients throughout your assigned territory to provide technical and business value
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to understanding client needs and aligning technical solutions with business value, which is the core of Business Understanding.

job_tasks.phrase: become a Big Data Analytics advisor on aspects of architecture and design
job_tasks.justification: Advising on architecture and design implies understanding the business context and how technical solutions support it.

job_tasks.phrase: gain excitement from clients about Databricks through hands-on evaluation and Spark programming, integrating with the wider cloud ecosystem and 3rd party applications.
job_tasks.justification: Hands-on evaluation and programming, especially with Spark and integrations, falls under the umbrella of software development and application building.

job_tasks.phrase: authoring reference architectures, how-tos, and demo applications.
job_tasks.justification: Creating reference architectures, how-tos, and demo applications are practical outputs of software development and technical solution building.

job_tasks.phrase: develop ... in the pre-sales aspect with the goal of becoming an independently operating Solutions Architect.
job_tasks.justification: Becoming a Solutions Architect involves the practical application of technical skills to design and present solutions, which is a form of software/solution development.
Spark programming is a form of developing and implementing data models and solutions, fitting within the Modeling category.

soft_skills.phrase: collaborative, customer-focused team that values innovation and creativity
collaboration with an Account Executive and a Senior Solutions Architect.
develop both technically and in the pre-sales aspect
customers solve their complex data challenges
work with a collaborative, customer-focused team

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes customer interaction, pre-sales activities, and advisory roles. There is a lack of specific focus on generative AI techniques, LLMs, or core GenAI development tasks, which are central to the GenAI Engineer profile.
